message: 'import' should be separated from previous statement.
Import statement for 'org.hamcrest.Matchers.*' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.hamcrest.Matchers.*.
Import statement for 'org.junit.Assert.*' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.junit.Assert.*.
